+

Item #:
 SCP-8978


Object Class:
 Safe


Special Containment Procedures:
 Scp-8978 must be contained in a 1 inch by 1 inch by 1 inch lock box.


Description:
 Scp-8978 is a white skeleton key that opens a wood door that has been transferred to the Light Containment Zone. The key must be 10 degrees celsius to open the wooden door. The place behind the door is an ice cold blizzard consumed forest known as Scp-8978-A. Scp-8978-A has two doors inside, the one that was entered and the exit. No one knows where the exit opens to because there is no known survivors. All that is known about Scp-8978-A via video recording is that is has a trail that leads to the forest and when the subject enter the forest the camera would cut out.


Special Containment Procedures:
 
Scp-8978-A:
 The door must be under 24 hour surveillance. And a motion camera must be in Scp-8978-A at all times.


Object Class:
 
Scp-8978-A:
 Euclid
